featured.text: It is also a first pressing, but has a slightly higher acidity level (under 2%).
The performer’s fingers have to be slightly wet when playing it.
Often those songs have a simple, upbeat melody and catchy, repetitive lyrics, such as popular commercial jingles and slightly annoying radio hits.
Generally speaking, our biological clock is slightly disturbed if we just move into the next time zone, but jet lag becomes a problem once we have passed through three or four time zones.

definition.en_def: To a small degree; not considerably.
definition.example: She was slightly tired after the long walk.
